question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/state/set_oracle_queue_id_action.move] [Function: run()] [Operation Status] Can oracle_queue_id be changed while vault status is 'during_operation', potentially causing the operation to use inconsistent oracle data halfway through?
